articles.description: His first album of original songs in eight years, “Rough and Rowdy Ways,” drops in June.
articles.content: Bob Dylan will release his first album of original songs in eight years, “Rough and Rowdy Ways,” on June 19. Early Friday, Dylan dropped a third song from the album, the swaggering, guitar-heavy False Prophet, which follows Murder Most Foul and I Contain Mult… [+1873 chars]

articles.title: National Treasure TV series planned for Disney+, will arrive with third theatrical film - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A third theatrical film in the National Treasure franchise is being planned. It will arrive simultaneously with a spinoff series for Disney Plus.
articles.content: A series based on the Nicolas Cage-starrer National Treasure films is being developed at Disney Plus. The revelation was made by Jerry Bruckheimer, who produced both the original 2004 movie and its 2007 sequel, National Treasure: Book of Secrets, during an in… [+715 chars]

articles.title: Mansplaining The Bechdel Test To Rick And Morty Fans - Bleeding Cool News
articles.description: Tonight's Rick and Morty referenced the Bechdel Test. Yes, it is actually a thing. And also yes, The Simpsons did it first.
articles.content: This week saw the return of Rick & Morty to television screens and tonight the UK got it on E4 and the All4 App. Never Ricking Morty was the most self-referencing, up-its-own-arse episode yet, and it was all the better for it. It began by making the show'… [+3653 chars]
